<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Combine Credit"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/3/person/{person_id}/combined_credits"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint get the combined movie and TV credits that belong to a person.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"language","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","default":"en-US"}},{"name":"person_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","example":213121}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
